Welcome to
Hillsborough Family Dental Centre

Setting the Gold Standard in Dental Care.

Well established, with long serving staff

At Hillsborough Family Dental Centre in the centre of Nottinghamshire, we aim to meet our patient's expectations and deliver exceptional patient care that puts our patients at the heart of everything we do. We aim to deliver this approach in all aspects of our service to you.

In our practice you will find up to 20 highly qualified dentists - including dentists that focus on cosmetic dental care provision, and staff members who aim to deliver the very best quality in patient care to you throughout Nottinghamshire. In addition to this we also offer our patients flexible working hours, which takes into consideration the needs of our patients and their families with busy lives.

If you would like straighter teeth, or a brighter, whiter smile, or even if you would prefer to have natural teeth coloured fillings instead of the traditional grey or black fillings, please call us on 0114 2344810 and speak to one of our friendly reception team and ask for a cosmetic care consulation - this is currently available for a limited period only at a cost of Â£30.00 that is payable in advance to see a dentist to discuss your needs.

Dental Care for Everyone

At Hillsborough Family Dental Centre, we believe everyone deserves a radiant smile and top-tier dental care. We proudly open our doors to all individuals, regardless of whether you're an existing patient or looking to visit us for the first time. We offer a wide variety both NHS and Private Treatments available to patients of any age. Our commitment is unwavering: to provide exceptional dental services to every patient, no matter their age or background. Entrust us with your dental health, and experience the warmth and professionalism that defines our practice. Our telephone number is 0114 2344810

Emergencies

To be seen in the event of an emergency, simply call 111 or contact the practice either by phone or in person and we will try our best to provide treatment for your situation.

You can contact the practice at 0114 2344810

Our Treatments

Whether you're looking for General Dental Treatment or Cosmetic Care, we at Hillsborough Family Dental Centre offer a wide variety of treatment options available to everyone.

Check Ups

Regular examination to ensure your teeth and gums are as healthy as possible

Fillings

Prevent toothache, bad breath, infection, and even the loss of teeth which can result from a cavity or damaged tooth

Extractions

A procedure to remove teeth that are severely damaged, impacted, or decayed.

Emergency

Urgent dental care for unexpected issues like severe pain, swelling, or trauma to the mouth.

Whitening

A cosmetic treatment designed to enhance the brightness of teeth, removing stains and discoloration.

Invisalign

A modern approach to straightening teeth using custom-made aligners crafted for an individual's teeth.

Implants

Artificial tooth roots that provide a strong foundation for fixed or removable replacement teeth.

Crowns

Tooth-shaped caps placed over a tooth to restore its shape, size, strength, and appearance.

Dentures

Removable replacements for missing teeth and surrounding tissues.

Bridges

Dental restorations used to fill the gap created by one or more missing teeth.

Periodontal

Treatments focusing on the care and maintenance of the supporting structures of the teeth, including gums and bone.

Multi-Award Winning Dentistry

Hillsborough Family Dental Centre is a modern, diverse and multi-cultural dental practice that has been designed with setting the Gold Standard in Dental Care provision in mind and consistently demonstrates steadfast dedication and commitment to providing a highly professional and friendly service to both NHS and Private patients alike.
